comments.html:
Hi Ivan,

What would you recommend for a simple Lab environment with enough complexities to learn IPv6? Any design or topology guidance?
comments.name: Chris.young@HP.com

comments.html: Enterprise or SP focus? For enterprise, a few routers and switches, a server (web, DNS, DHCP) or two and a few clients (Windows, OSX, Linux, iPad) should be more than enough. IPv6 connectivity to the global Internet is a definite plus.
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak
